Ver. 1.01b

Why can't we see 96% of our universe? Why does our body attack itself? What's the latest in nanotechnology? How do I protect my privacy on the Internet?

If you're curious about the secrets of nature, wonder why it's taking so long to cure diseases, what we can do to live with climate change, or was if the future of digital media, you've come to the right place. At Science Friday, we talk to inquiring minds looking for answers.

Each week on NPR, Science Friday and it's host Ira Flatow bring you the latest news about science, health, space, technology and the environment. Our experts are on the cutting edge, but we never talk down to you. You're sure to enjoy our podcasts (check out our Video App, too.)

So head over to www.sciencefriday.com to check out our website, tune in to the live broadcast of SciFri each Friday afternoon at 2-4pm ET and subscribe to our podcasts.

Join other interesting folks at our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/scifri

Twitter: \@scifri

See ya!

Ira
